articles.title: Ukrainian drone attack sets Russian oil depot on fire as Zelenskyy announces prisoner exchange
articles.description: An overnight Ukrainian drone attack on an oil depot near Russia's Black Sea resort of Sochi sparked a major fire, Russian officials said on Sunday (August 3, 2025), as the two countries traded strikes and the Ukrainian President announced a prisoner exchange. [1, 11]

articles.title: 2024 Lok Sabha polls were 'rigged' and we will prove it, alleges Rahul Gandhi
articles.description: In a no-holds-barred attack on the Election Commission of India (ECI) on Saturday (August 2, 2025), Leader of Opposition (LoP) in the Lok Sabha Rahul Gandhi alleged that the 2024 Lok Sabha elections were rigged and claimed that the Congress party suspects anywhere between 70 and 100 seats were manipulated. [2]

articles.title: Manhunt for mass shooting suspect in Anaconda Montana
articles.description: Melissa Adan reporting on the urgent manhunt for an army veteran accused of shooting and killing four people in Montana. [9]
articles.source: ABC World News Tonight with David Muir
